languages.text: "Надеюсь. Потому что мои были пропитаны ядом. В моей крови есть противоядие, но если бы их кто-то украл..."
"For your sake, I hope you are right. My boots were coated in poison. I have the antidote in my blood, but if someone were to steal them from me..."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь. Потому что мои были пропитаны ядом. В моей крови есть противоядие, но если бы их кто-то украл..."

"For your sake, I hope you are right. My boots were coated in poison. I have the antidote in my blood, but if someone were to steal them from me..."

languages.text: 「お前のためにも、そうであってほしい。私のブーツには毒が塗られていた。私の血には解毒剤が入っているが、もし誰かに盗まれてしまったら…」
languages.original_text: "For your sake, I hope you are right. My boots were coated in poison. I have the antidote in my blood, but if someone were to steal them from me..."

traits.locale_text: 「お前のためにも、そうであってほしい。私のブーツには毒が塗られていた。私の血には解毒剤が入っているが、もし誰かに盗まれてしまったら…」

languages.text: “如果真是这样，那就好。毕竟我的靴子上涂了毒药，这种毒药对我不起作用，可如果有人把我的靴子偷走的话……”
languages.original_text: "For your sake, I hope you are right. My boots were coated in poison. I have the antidote in my blood, but if someone were to steal them from me..."

traits.locale_text: “如果真是这样，那就好。毕竟我的靴子上涂了毒药，这种毒药对我不起作用，可如果有人把我的靴子偷走的话……”

languages.text: «Más vale que tenga razón. Mis botas estaban cubiertas de veneno. El antídoto corre por mi sangre, pero si alguien me las robara...».
languages.original_text: "For your sake, I hope you are right. My boots were coated in poison. I have the antidote in my blood, but if someone were to steal them from me..."

traits.locale_text: «Más vale que tenga razón. Mis botas estaban cubiertas de veneno. El antídoto corre por mi sangre, pero si alguien me las robara...».

languages.text: "Ich hoffe für Euch, dass Ihr recht habt. Meine Stiefel waren mit Gift überzogen. Ich habe das Gegengift im Blut, aber wenn sie mir jemand stiehlt ..."
languages.original_text: "For your sake, I hope you are right. My boots were coated in poison. I have the antidote in my blood, but if someone were to steal them from me..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe für Euch, dass Ihr recht habt. Meine Stiefel waren mit Gift überzogen. Ich habe das Gegengift im Blut, aber wenn sie mir jemand stiehlt ..."

languages.text: « J'espère pour vous que vous avez raison. Mes bottes étaient enduites de poison. Moi, j'ai l'antidote dans le sang, mais si quelqu'un d'autre devait les porter... »
languages.original_text: "For your sake, I hope you are right. My boots were coated in poison. I have the antidote in my blood, but if someone were to steal them from me..."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère pour vous que vous avez raison. Mes bottes étaient enduites de poison. Moi, j'ai l'antidote dans le sang, mais si quelqu'un d'autre devait les porter... »

languages.text: "Kendi iyiliğin için umarım doğruyu söylüyorsundur. Botlarım zehirle kaplanmıştı. Benim kanımda panzehir var ama birisi botlarımı çalmış olsa..."
languages.original_text: "For your sake, I hope you are right. My boots were coated in poison. I have the antidote in my blood, but if someone were to steal them from me..."
